name: search_for_a_champion
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool league_of_legends_galore.
Tool description: Get Details aboat players, champions, and more!

Check the About page for details on every API!
API description: This will go through the list of champions and return a single champion or a list of champions depending on YOUR request!

name.description: Name of the champion. Default is 'zed'.

rp.description: Riot Points cost of the champion.

blueessence.description: Blue Essence cost of the champion.
